title: Arun Shourie Parody Account Is Still Up & Real Shourie Is Enraged
subtitle: The user, who had joined the platform on March 2015, has tweeted more than 3,000 times so far and is being followed by 18,400 users.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The Quint reached out to Arun Shourie himself who confirmed that he does not operate the account, adding that he is aware of the parody account and has tried multiple times to take it down.

“I am enraged at the criminal behaviour of Twitter,”said Shourie over phone, adding that he has reached out to the social media giant “verbally and in writing”.

“I have also sent Twitter a notice,” says Shourie. He said the only occasion when he received a response from Twitter was when reached out to them verbally and Twitter assured him of taking action. As is evident by the handle’s continued tweeting, the ‘action’ was not taken.
